name: We're Not Calling It Slenderman
description:
You wake up in the middle of the forest and want to escape to go back home, but slowly realize that your lost! You find papers with seemingly random letters on it, but as you go on to collect more papers, you soon realize that you might not be alone. You are being chased by a evil tree! You must collect all of the pages before the arboreal aberration catches you!

Made for CMPM/ARTG 170 Fall 2022

  • Andrew Cho                     - Concept Artist, 3D modeler
  • Hitesh Ahuja                    - Programmer
  • Kirsten Lindblad             - Concept Artist, 3D modeler
  • Nicholas Pastoria             - Producer, Sound Designer
  • Raymond Metzger          - Programmer
  • Santiago Ponce                 - Level Designer, Programmer, Unreal Expert
  • Zachary Thompson        - Presentation Editor
